mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.main_id AS "mainId", a.name AS "name", a.unit AS "unit", a.duty AS "duty", a.political_status AS "politicalStatus", a.archives_no AS "archivesNo", a.certificate_no AS "certificateNo", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN tbl_consult_archives b ON b.id = a.main_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_checked_target( id, main_id, name, unit, duty, political_status, archives_no, certificate_no, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{mainId}, #{name}, #{unit}, #{duty}, #{politicalStatus}, #{archivesNo}, #{certificateNo}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_checked_target SET main_id = #{mainId}, name = #{name}, unit = #{unit}, duty = #{duty}, political_status = #{politicalStatus}, archives_no = #{archivesNo}, certificate_no = #{certificateNo}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
